member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT
member.summary: Provides data for calls to when the feature specified is . Retrieves values indicating support for the specified video encoding features and configuration values.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT.NodeIndex
member.summary: In multi-adapter operation, this indicates which physical adapter of the device this operation applies to.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT.Codec
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the codec for which support is being queried.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT.InputFormat
member.summary: A structure specifying the profile for which support is being queried.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT.CodecConfiguration
member.summary: A structure representing the codec configuration for which support is being queried.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT.CodecGopSequence
member.summary: A structure representing the GOP structure for which support is being queried.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT.RateControl
member.summary: A representing the rate control settings for which support is being queried.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT.IntraRefresh
member.summary: A member of the enumeration specifying the intra refresh mode for which support is being queried.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT.SubregionFrameEncoding
member.summary: A member of the enumeration, specifying the subregion layout mode for which support is being queried.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT.ResolutionsListCount
member.summary: A UINT specifying the number of resolutions provided in the pResolutionList field.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT.pResolutionList
member.summary: A pointer to an array of specifying the picture resolutions for which support is being queried.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT.MaxReferenceFramesInDPB
member.summary: A UINT specifying Maximum number of previous reference frames to be used when calling for inter-frames. This value is used to calculate the suggested level returned in the SuggestedLevel field.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT.ValidationFlags
member.summary: Receives a bitwise OR combination of flags from the enumeration that provide additional details if the flag is not set in the SupportFlags field. See Remarks for more information.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT.SupportFlags
member.summary: Receives a bitwise OR combination of flags from the enumeration specifying support details for the specified encoder features and configuration values.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT.SuggestedProfile
member.summary: Receives a specifying the recommended profile for the specified encoder features and configuration values.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT.SuggestedLevel
member.summary: Receives a specifying the recommended profile for the specified encoder features and configuration values. The recommended level assumes the maximum resolution from the list provided in pResolutionList.

member.name: D3D12_FEATURE_DATA_VIDEO_ENCODER_SUPPORT.pResolutionDependentSupport
member.summary: Receives a pointer to an array of structures specifying resolution-dependent support limits corresponding to the resolutions provided in pResolutionList.
